item.title: Contact
item.description: Pomsky is maintained by Ludwig Stecher. You can reach me via email. You can sponsor me via GitHub sponsors. To report a problem with Pomsky or propose a new feature, create an issue. For discussions or getting help, you can join our Discord.

item.title: Docs
item.description: Get Started Start your journey with Pomsky, the next-level regular expression language. Language Tour Introduction to matching text with Pomsky. No prior knowledge required. Examples See real-world Pomsky expressions, and how they compare to traditional regexes. Reference Comprehensive technical documentation about the language. Appendix Additional resources All pages:
